name: Edited To Pending Review
author: Elvis Nyakangi

sections.description:
This plugin performs a very simple task. Once a Product or Post has been published and a front-end user with non-admin rights clicks save or update, the product or post will move to Pending Review until it is published by the Admin.

More about the Plugin:

  • This is a light weight plugin that is less than 2 kb.
  • You do not need any setting. Just install, activate and you are done.
  • It is a compatible with the latest version of WordPress.
  • It has been tested and known to work with a number of marketplace themes which allow users to submit and edit products and posts.
  • It works with Woocommerce WC Vendors plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress

  3. You are done! No more settings required
sections.faq:
Where do I change the settings?

This plugin does not require any settings. Once you install, it will do the magic

short_description: This plugin performs a simple task of moving edited products or posts to pending Review.
